segments.text: I'd like to buy some perform for my girlfriend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do you know what kind of scent she usually wears ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: she usually doesn't wear anything but a few drops of Chanel No . 5 . But I'd like to buy her a new Fragrance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ok , here are some of our most popular perfumes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: personally , I quite like the new perfume by Clinique . It's a subtle flowery scent . What do you think ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that smells great . I'll take one bottle , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: would you like to buy any other cosmetics for your girlfriend ? We have a full range of products from cosmetics to skin cleansers and moisturizers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it's ok . She normally just wears a little foundation and some loose powder , and I wouldn't know what shade to buy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: how about some lipstick ? Every woman needs a nice tube of red lipstick .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: she doesn't usually wear lipstick . She thinks it makes her nose look too big .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: how about some mascara ? That will make her eyes look bigger .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: no thank you . She has big enough eyes as it is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know what she would like---some whitening cream .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: no thanks . Western women usually try to make their skin darker , no lighter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that will be all . You're been very helpful , thanks .
segments.speaker: S2
